overview: Exactly one year since debuting on J Records, O-Town is a full-grown supergroup boasting one of the year's bestselling albums. O-Town: Live from New York was captured on the last night of their sold-out summer tour at New York City's famed Hammerstein Ballroom show on October 10. Features songs: Liquid Dreams, All Or Nothing, We Fit Together, Baby I Would, Sensitive, Sexiest Woman Alive, Painter, Shy Girl, Love Should Be A Crime, Every Six Seconds and a surprise version of Girl.
title: O-Town: Live from New York
